text: Irene Pivetti (born 4 April 1963) is an Italian journalist, television presenter and politician. She has been President of the Italian Chamber of Deputies from 1994 to 1996. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies (Italy) Category:Italian journalists Category:Italian television presenters Category:Italian television actors Category:Actors from Milan Category:Politicians from Milan Category:Writers from Milan
title: Irene Pivetti
